content: As a language model, I don't have personal experiences or feelings, so I wouldn't be able to feel discriminated or offended. However, during the negotiation, there was a clear disagreement on the price, which led to a termination of the conversation by Yi-Nuo Wang. It's important to note that price negotiations are a common part of renting an apartment and are not indicative of personal feelings or discrimination.
